headline: Tell HN: YouTube shipped a major redesign, broke its comments system
description:
they shipped a redesign to move comments to the RHS on desktop, but in the process seem to have broken them completely https://twitter.com/search?q=youtube%20comments&src=typed_query

see also https://www.express.co.uk/life-style/science-technology/1625472/YouTube-comments-not-showing-bug-hits-Google-owned-site
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：YouTube进行了一次重大的重新设计，打破了其评论系统
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：YouTube進行了一次重大的重新設計，打破了其評論系統
description_zh-Hans:
他们进行了重新设计，将评论移至桌面上的RHS，但在此过程中，似乎已经完全破坏了它们 https://twitter.com/search?q=youtube%20comments&src=typed_query

也请参见 https://www.express.co.uk/life-style/science-technology/1625472/YouTube-comments-not-showing-bug-hits-Google-owned-site
description_zh-Hant:
他們進行了重新設計，將評論移至桌面上的RHS，但在此過程中，似乎已經完全破壞了它們 https://twitter.com/search?q=youtube%20comments&src=typed_query

也請參見 https://www.express.co.uk/life-style/science-technology/1625472/YouTube-comments-not-showing-bug-hits-Google-owned-site
